member.name: CMSG_CTRL_KEY_TRANS_DECRYPT_PARA
member.summary: The CMSG_CTRL_KEY_TRANS_DECRYPT_PARA structure contains information about a key transport message recipient.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_KEY_TRANS_DECRYPT_PARA.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this data structure.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_KEY_TRANS_DECRYPT_PARA.DUMMYUNIONNAME.hCryptProv
member.summary: A handle to the cryptographic service provider (CSP) used to do the recipient key encryption and export. If NULL, the provider specified in is used. The CNG function is called to determine the union choice.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_KEY_TRANS_DECRYPT_PARA.DUMMYUNIONNAME.hNCryptKey
member.summary: A handle to the CNG CSP used to do the recipient key encryption and export. The CNG function is called to determine the union choice. New encrypt algorithms are only supported in CNG functions. The CNG function will be called to convert the CryptoAPI CSP hCryptProv choice where necessary. We recommend that applications pass, to the hNCryptKey member, the CNG CSP handle that is returned from the function.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_KEY_TRANS_DECRYPT_PARA.dwKeySpec
member.summary: Specifies the encrypted key. The encrypted key is the result of encrypting the content-encryption key for a specific recipient by using that recipient's public key. This member is not used when the hNCryptKey member is used.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_KEY_TRANS_DECRYPT_PARA.dwRecipientIndex
member.summary: Indicates a specific recipient in any array of recipients.
